name: Make Way for Noddy
description:
Description 

Make Way for Noddy is an Infinite runner with a 3rd person camera view where the player has to steer a spacecraft and collect Dogecoins while avoiding rhythmic platforms and patrolling enemies in an urban setting.

Controls 

WASD and Mouse for movement 

Fire - Right mouse button

Shift - move faster

Ctrl - move slower

Team Members
